items.name: Caffè Americano
items.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water. Available in Tall, Grande, and Venti sizes.

items.name: Pike Place® Roast
items.description: Our signature medium-roasted coffee with a smooth, balanced taste. Available in Tall, Grande, and Venti sizes.

items.name: Caramel Frappuccino
items.description: Caramel syrup, coffee, milk and ice, topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce. Available in Tall, Grande, and Venti sizes.

items.name: Mocha Frappuccino
items.description: Mocha sauce, coffee, milk and ice, topped with whipped cream. Available in Tall, Grande, and Venti sizes.

notes: Prices are for Tall size. Grande and Venti sizes available at additional cost.
